Affordable Housing
Aegon Real Assets US invests in affordable 
housing as both a direct investor and a syndicator. This is done through the US government’s Low-Income Housing Tax Credit (LIHTC) program. Enacted by the Tax Reform Act of 1986, the LIHTC program allocates tax credits to states based on population, then agencies award tax credits for the acquisition, rehabilitation, or construction of rental housing targeted to lower-income households.Since 1987, we have been managing and investing in tax credits to support affordable housing. As of December 31, 2019, our direct investments cover more than 300 separate properties, providing housing for families earning an average of no more than 60% of local area median household incomes.
